parts.text:
```xml
<output>
<analysis>
<has-cmf>False. There is no CMF number present in the provided post information.</has-cmf>
<refers-to-candidate>False. While the post is from the RMDSZ Maros Megye (Hungarian Democratic Union of Romania, Maros County), it does not explicitly mention any specific candidate by name or implicitly refer to a specific candidate participating in the parliamentary elections. The text "Holnap nem veszíthetünk" (Tomorrow we cannot lose) is a general statement and not a direct endorsement of a specific candidate.</refers-to-candidate>
<addresses-the-wide-population>True. The post is a paid advertisement on Facebook, a public platform, and the message is clearly intended for a wide audience within Maros County, Romania, as indicated by the targeting data.</addresses-the-wide-population>
<electoral-objective>Potentially True.  The phrase "Holnap nem veszíthetünk" (Tomorrow we cannot lose) strongly suggests an electoral objective.  While not explicitly mentioning a candidate, the timing (the day before the election) and the implied urgency create a strong call to action, implicitly urging voters to support the RMDSZ. This is further supported by the fact that it's a paid political advertisement from a political party.</electoral-objective>
<journalism>False. The post lacks the characteristics of journalistic reporting. It does not present factual information, analysis, or diverse perspectives. Instead, it presents a partisan message aimed at mobilizing support for the RMDSZ.</journalism>
<personal_opinion>False. The statement is not a personal opinion; it's a political statement made by a political party, aiming to influence voters.</personal_opinion>
</analysis>

<conclusion>
<post_id>503980579343231</post_id>
<electoral-propaganda-analysis>
The post, while not explicitly mentioning a candidate, strongly implies an electoral objective by using the phrase "Tomorrow we cannot lose" in a paid political advertisement on the day before the election.  The targeting data shows it's aimed at a wide audience in Maros County.  While it doesn't directly violate Article 36 (7) - a (direct reference to a candidate), it arguably violates Article 36 (7) - c (electoral objective) and potentially falls under the prohibition of Article 98 t) due to its implicit call to action and its timing. The lack of explicit candidate mention might be considered "in dubio pro reo," but the overall context strongly suggests an attempt to influence the vote.
</electoral-propaganda-analysis>
<electoral-propaganda-decision>TRUE</electoral-propaganda-decision>
<electoral-propaganda-candidates>
  <candidate><name>RMDSZ</name><impact>POSITIVE</impact></candidate>
</electoral-propaganda-candidates>
<responsible-party-or-group>RMDSZ</responsible-party-or-group>
<message-for-police>
RMDSZ Maros Megye, pentru încălcarea articolului 98 t) din LEGEA nr. 208 din 20 iulie 2015, prin publicarea unei reclame politice plătite pe Facebook cu mesajul "Holnap nem veszíthetünk", difuzată după ora 18:00 pe 23.11.2024, cu scopul de a influența votul în favoarea RMDSZ în alegerile parlamentare.  Mesajul, deși nu menționează un candidat specific, creează o urgență și un apel implicit la acțiune, vizând o audiență largă în județul Mureș, conform datelor de targetare.  Reclama, cu un buget de 100-199 RON, a generat 25.000-30.000 de impresii, având potențialul de a influența semnificativ rezultatul alegerilor.  Contact: rmdszms@rmdsz.ro, +40754205269, https://www.rmdsz.ro/. ID-ul postării pe Facebook este 503980579343231.
</message-for-police>
</conclusion>
</output>
```
